welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Griesheim, Germany! Known for its beautiful green spaces and friendly locals, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in our unique culture."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and its Star Alliance partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Under construction and set to open in 2023, this new terminal will increase the airport's capacity and serve as a hub for Lufthansa and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 24 hours by registering with an email address.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
